Title: Relates to the effect of military service on child care
Summary: Provides for the review of a suitable child care plan to be presented by the petitioning parent for the period of deployment, including but not limited to, reasonable notice by deploying parent to other parent of deployment, procedures for parents to make out of court arrangements regarding custody and visitation during deployment; prohibits an order of permanent custody without deployed parent's consent; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง240, Dom Rel L; amd ยง651, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to the effect of military service on child care
